channel.title: OWASP SAMM on Open Security Summit 2018
channel.description: Recent content in OWASP SAMM on Open Security Summit 2018

item.title: Creating an open 3rd Party Supplier Questionnaire and maturity model
item.description: Consolidate shared (by Summit participants) 3rd party questionnaire currently used internally Use the https://github.com/owasp/maturity-models tool to create an easy way to capture and visualise the data.

item.title: Implementing the OWASP responsible disclosure Maturity Model
item.description: Hands-on session on using the https://github.com/owasp/maturity-models tool to implement the model created in last year’s summit https://owaspsummit.org/Working-Sessions/Security-Crowdsourcing/Responsible-disclosure.html

item.title: SAMM - Best Practices
item.description: Sharing best practices on how to get the most out of Owasp SAMM

item.title: SAMM benchmarking
item.description: Define objectives for the SAMM benchmarking project as part of SAMMv2

item.title: SAMM Introduction
item.description: Crash course on SAMM as project and overview of the content/actions so far

item.title: SAMM Project Meeting
item.description: Project meeting to review the status and update the plan for SAMM2

item.title: SAMM Round Table
item.description: SAMM users sharing experiences with each other

item.title: SAMM2 Kickoff
item.description: Discuss agenda - goals for this week. Welcome people who are going to participate

item.title: SAMMv2 Establish the Document Model
item.description: The aim is to reach a consensus on which elements we need to have in order to be able to describe the document and to arrive at a YAML format.

item.title: SAMMv2 Measurement Model
item.description: What Discussion about measuring according to coverage vs. quality. How do we want to measure in SAMM 2.0?

item.title: SAMMv2 working session - Design
item.description: One working session per business function. Review the draft business function. Identify received and on-site feedback (capture as issues). Discuss and resolve the business function issues. Create one Issue per business function with the agreed upon changes to be implemented.

item.title: SAMMv2 working session - Governance
item.description: One working session per business function. Review the draft business function. Identify received and on-site feedback (capture as issues). Discuss and resolve the business function issues. Create one Issue per business function with the agreed upon changes to be implemented.

item.title: SAMMv2 working session - Implementation
item.description: One working session per business function. Review the draft business function. Identify received and on-site feedback (capture as issues). Discuss and resolve the business function issues. Create one Issue per business function with the agreed upon changes to be implemented.

item.title: SAMMv2 working session - Operations
item.description: One working session per business function. Review the draft business function. Identify received and on-site feedback (capture as issues). Discuss and resolve the business function issues. Create one Issue per business function with the agreed upon changes to be implemented.

item.title: SAMMv2 working session - Verification
item.description: One working session per business function. Review the draft business function. Identify received and on-site feedback (capture as issues). Discuss and resolve the business function issues. Create one Issue per business function with the agreed upon changes to be implemented.

item.title: Using the OWASP Maturity Model tool
item.description: Hands-on session on using the https://github.com/owasp/maturity-models tool
